body:
## jQuery Zoomer

Zoom up any iFrame.

### Browser support

Tested and working: Chrome, FF3.6+, IE8+

### Usage

    $('iframe').zoomer({ width: 200, zoom: 0.5 });

### Demo

*Coming soon!*
name: Jquery Zoomer
